sections.heading: Definitions. Modifications of federal unrelated business taxable income
sections.text: Section 12-242bb. - Imposition of tax on unrelated business income of nonprofit corporations. Apportionment. “Tangible personal property” defined.Section 12-242cc and 12-242dd. - Reserved for future use.
